name: return-clarity-extension
description: Chrome extension that extracts and displays return policy summaries for Shopify stores

scripts.dev: vite build --config vite.content.config.ts && node scripts/postbuild.js && KEEP_DIST=1 vite build --watch --mode development
scripts.build: tsc --noEmit && vite build && node scripts/postbuild.js && vite build --config vite.content.config.ts
